SUPPORTIVE ENVIRONMENTAL 
CONDITIONS
-   Appropriate provision of health care 
services for optimum nutrition for 
maternal and infant health
-   Appropriate education of health 
professionals on diet-related issues
-   Specific guidance on clinical care 
pathways to manage and prevent 
underweight, overweight and obesity
-   Incorporation of e-health with shared 
access among the different groups of 
health care professionals
PREGNANCY
-   Dietary advice
-   Physical activity advice
